description: Like a pair of jeans, but with built-in functionality. Greenland Jeans are a durable everyday pair of trousers that also work well on trekking or fishing outings. Articulated knees and gusset at the crotch give comfortable freedom of movement when stepping over logs and stones and the leg pocket takes care of a map, phone or a box of fishing lures. Durable, fast-drying G-1000. Regular Fit with tapered cut. Longer leg length (+5 cm). 65% recycled polyester, 35% organic cotton. Gusset at crotch for comfort and freedom of movement. Articulated knees. Leg pocket with flap and button. Two hand pockets. Coin pocket. Two back pockets. Wind- and water-resistant. Weather protection can be adapted with Greenland Wax.
name: Fjallraven Greenland Jeans, Long - Mens
